pkgmetadata.longdescription: App guardians.# Usage```pythonimport asynciofrom typing import Any, Dictfrom codefast.asyncio.rabbitmq import consumefrom rich import printfrom custodes.server import getfrom custodes.client import postasync def main(): return await asyncio.gather( post('custodes server', {'code': 0, 'message': 'OK'}, loop=True, expire=120), get() )if __name__ == '__main__': cf.info('custodes server started...') asyncio.run(main())```
